item.title: Network connectivity alternative Workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Most messages by ARM are irrelevant. If you want to learn about what they mean, see:

Whonix – 12 Dec 19

Control and Monitor Tor

Using a Tor Controller with Whonix ™. onioncircuits. Nyx. Vidalia. View or Change your Tor circuits. Monitor Tor and inspect logs.

Looks like sdwdate broke connectivity by messing up your clock. It’s a known bug (https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/issues/295) and will be fixed in Whonix 9. When using VM’s the easiest way would be to power off, and power on the VM again.
